Лучший симулятор троллинга Гладос
10/10
a fun, charming and immersive brain-teaser that is a classic of modern gaming. You owe it to yourself to get this game and experience the days when videogames were about fun.
非常好玩的解谜游戏
可以，单人玩的话也很有意思，难度还好，一点点增加。有一点比较有意思的剧情，加分。
Хорошая игра
The only con is the short storyline, I finished the game in 9hrs. Bought the game for 2$ though on sale, so definetely worth the money. 10/10
좋습니당
Очень душевная игра
Fun game. Buy it please.

上高中的时候看同学玩过，觉得很新奇，入steam坑不久遇到秋季特惠就和前作一起买了。
很有创意的游戏，也有不错的剧情贯穿其中。无论是整个游戏的节奏，还是游戏的画面，都让人很享受，探索解谜的过程更是很吸引人。空间大小的变换、新机关的逐渐加入，让人不会觉得单调。难度不算大，但是中后段（大概五六七章？）有一段不在实验室而在厂房一类的地方，空间比较大，有点考眼神，有时候会一时找不到方向。没有对我这种手残不友好的操作难度较大的内容。
游戏里还有专门的版块展示剧情/关卡的设计初衷，也蛮有意思。
只玩了单人模式，据说双人模式很欢乐（脑补往队友脚下开枪的画面），找时间拉机油一试。
题外话：结束曲一出来我不知为何一下联想到了……There's a zombie on your lawn...
友情提示1：据晕3D的同学说，感觉比cs cf PUBG都晕，晕3D慎入
友情提示2：英文听力不够的话可以在音频设置里打开[spoiler]（略为尴尬的）[/spoiler]中文字幕
Супер, нет слов... Шэдевр!!! Особенно кооператив !!!
Интересная игра на логику
打折买的，单人模式已通关~，结尾CG里黄色核心很喜感，hhhh~

Portal 2 is a very interesting and funny game, has a lot of easter eggs and makes me curious to explore the map there are a lot of openings to "escape" the testings makes the game extremly good. I understand why people love the game, I like staying and thinking how to solve the map, 1. I inspect the map where is the end of the test. 2. Find openings for easter eggs Valve seems to like adding bunch of easter eggs to their game. 3. Use your brain to solve maps but perhaps sometimes people don't use knowledge to pass the test. 4. Buy the game, it is worth the money if u like action/puzzle/funny game.

好好好

Un juego realmente fascinante, mucho mejor que el primero a mi parecer al traer distintos niveles aunque algo mas lentos en cuanto a la rapidez que se necesitaba en ciertas ocasiones en el primero, pero nos da una buena historia que yo personalmente espero que algun dia continue asi como la de half-life... en fin una verdadera obra maestra :D

I've been playing this game ever since it came out -- almost 7 years at this point -- and it's never gotten old for me. I can't tell you how many times I've beaten the single-player campaign or how many community test chambers I've completed. This game is perfect in every way. The witty and memorable narrative, the plot twists, the satisfying controls and mechanics -- all of these elements come together to create something that easily beats the experience of every other game I've ever played, and I imagine I'll keep playing this for years to come.
creative

After I was introduced to the first Portal I had a feeling I had to continue to Portal 2. My best friend's urgings to do so probably didn't help with that.

So here I am, having spent a moderate amount of time enjoying the portal series as a whole.

As someone with no clear place on a skill spectrum, let me say that this has to be one of the most lovingly crafted and quirky puzzle games of all time, with supreme co-op and incredible durability.

It'll likely go down for many years to come as a sparkling achievement in Valve's trophy cabinet.
Good game for coop
Super jeu, que je recommande à tout le monde peu importe le type de jeu auquel ils jouent. Une expérience à pas rater

Quem jogou o primeiro já pôde ver um jogo de puzzle bastante divertido e que tem o poder de prender o jogador dentro do jogo, a querer resolver de qualquer forma aquele obstáculo. O 2 é ainda mais facinante, modo história com um plot twist incrível e multiplayer muito divertido!

Creo que portal me parte el cerebro, pero sin duda amo el juego por que me hace pensar mucho en como resolver cada habitacion de prueba. Ademas el modo cooperativo me divirtio mucho, por que tenia que coordinar con una amiga que estaba literalmente al otro lado del mundo como pasar cada etapa. Ame definitivamente todo del juego, y definitivamente quede in love de GLaDOS.
Ha pasado un buen tiempo y sigo pensando lo mismo, soy la loca de los robots y portal sin duda es mi juego favorito

So there I was, zero day 3 am, playing Portal 2. For whatever reason I decided to screw around and placate the AI. Low and behold I got a fitting achievement that sent me lmfao. That's my key Portal 2 experience. Detail and whit are what make this game great.

El juego es otra obra maestra de VALVe, con historia increíble (obvia continuación :v, y algo corta además), presonajes memorables, y humor (y sarcasmo); hicieron un gran trabajo al añadirle nuevas mecánicas, y es muy recomendable jugarlo; pero para el multiplayer es mejor jugarlo con amigos, si no no (si es que siquiera logras encontrar una partida con desconocidos). En fin, el juego es buenísimno

I have never felt interested for any Valve's Game, until one day I played Portal 2. It is a short game but I have never seen an such enemy like GLaDOS. If I create an enemy list, She is gonna be there for sure. The rest of the game is really good, interesting and the idea about the portal is very unique. 

I highly recommend this game if you one to have fun with I simple game but at the same time feel so weird connection with that robot.
